      • notify

        java.lang.Object notify(java.lang.String eventId,
                        java.lang.Long docId,
                        org.apache.camel.Message request,
                        int delay)
        Performs the notification.
        Parameters:
        eventId - correlates with the process instance(s) to notify
        docId - the request document id
        request - the message whose body contents are to be sent to the notify receiver(s)
        delay - in seconds
        Returns:
        the response document
